item.title: Version 0.14.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.14.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Smart Folders with Tags: Smart folders can now use tags as filter conditions. Create dynamic folders that automatically collect links based on their tags.
  • Open Tab in Another Browser: Quickly open the current tab in a different browser directly from SupaSidebar.
  • Preferred Browser per Link: Set a preferred browser for individual links. When opened, the link will automatically launch in your chosen browser.
  • Tooltip Delay: Added option to configure tooltip delay, giving you control over when tooltips appear on hover.
  • French Translations: Added French language support.
  • Cmd + Click Options: Configure what happens when you Cmd + Click a link - open in frontmost browser, preferred browser, or show preview.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed browser window resizing on space change even when sidebar is not visible.
  • Fixed license activation error.
  • Fixed edit menu showing links in root folder instead of their actual folder location.
  • Fixed edit menu displaying folders in random order instead of hierarchical structure.
  • Fixed browser reopening after being closed.
  • Fixed open at login not working.
